pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Bayne - Bayesian Neural NetworksPytorch/Pyro-based Bayesian Neural Networks libraryFeatures:- Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) - Fully connected neural network with ReLU, Sigmoid, or Tanh activation - Configurable prior & likelihood - Hamiltonian Monte Carlo or NUTS samplerAuthors:- Frederik Baymler Mathiesen, PhD student @ TU Delft, Netherlands
